doc:
Petra Markham https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Petra_Markham 0 Petra Mavis Markham (born 17 March 1944 in Prestbury, Cheshire) is a British theatre, television and film actress. She is a daughter of actor David Markham and writer Olive Dehn (1914–2007). She has three sisters: actress Kika Markham, Sonia Markham, and Jehane Markham. Petra_Mavis_Markham ( born 17_March_1944 in Prestbury , Cheshire ) is a_British_theatre_,_television_and_film_actress . She is a_daughter of actor_David_Markham_and_writer_Olive_Dehn_(_1914 – 2007_) . She has three_sisters : actress_Kika_Markham , Sonia_Markham , and Jehane_Markham .
